communicationOP.title: Use OP-Communication instead of default PG-Communication
communicationOP.description: On some PLCs the number of PG connections is limited so it could make sense to switch to OP.

enablePolling.title: Enable polling
enablePolling.description: When enabled a background task is executed every second enable polling for the accessories

defaultPollInterval.title: Default polling interval in seconds
defaultPollInterval.description: This defines the default polling interval when no interval is set per accessory

distributePolling.title: Distribute polling
distributePolling.description: When enabled he polling of the accessories does not start at the same time. In order to distribute the PLC load for the queries.

enablePush.title: Enable push server
enablePush.description:
When enabled a http server is started to receive push updates of values form PLC. The PLC has send an http request
e.g: 'http://homebridgeIp:8888/?push&db=6096&offset=1.1&value=1'

enableControl.title: Enable control server
enableControl.description:
When enabled a http server is started to allow control accessories by http.
e.g.: 'http://homebridgeIp:8888/?control&db=1014&offset=1&value=3'

port.title: Port for server
port.description: Port for http server to handle incoming http requests for push and control functionality. Default port is 8888

forward.title: Enable Forward of push and control requests
forward.description: There is a limit of maximum 149 supported accessories by homebridge. To overcome this is limited you can create a second instance of homebridge running homebridge-plc and forward all push and control with no matching db to the other instance. Set the destination address of the second instance e.g. http:\127.0.0.1:8889

mirror.title: Mirror readings and push requests from PLC
mirror.description: There are environments where it could make sense to share the same accessories on two homebridge instances. To allow pairing with another Home with Apple Home App or Home Assistant. This option mirrors all values read from PLC by this instance to a second instance. It also forwards all push requests to the second instance. The option enablePush has to be enabled on the second instance. on the destination instance. Set the destination address of the second instance e.g. http:\192.168.1.11:8888. (expirimental feature)

name.title: Name
name.description: Define the uniqe name for the accessory.

db.title: s7 data base number e.g. 4 for DB4

manufacturer.title: Manufacturer
manufacturer.description: Set the manufacturer name for display in the Home app.

enablePolling.title: Enable polling
enablePolling.description: Has only effect when polling is enabled on platform level.

pollInterval.title: Polling interval in seconds
pollInterval.description: Overwrites platform defined default polling interval

adaptivePolling.title: adaptive Polling **(optional)**
adaptivePolling.description: When set to `true` the current position will be polled until target position is reached. Polling starts with set target position from home app. This allows to show the shutter as opening... or closing... in the home app during movement.

adaptivePollingInterval.title: adaptivePollingInterval **(optional)**
adaptivePollingInterval.description: **(optional)** poll interval in seconds during high frequency polling. Default value is `1` second.

get_On.title: offset get_On **(push support)**
get_On.description: offset and bit to read current on/off state from PLC. S7 type Bool e.g. 55.1

set_On.title: Single Bit mode: offset set_On **(control support)**
set_On.description: Single Bit mode: offset and bit to set to 1/0 to PLC when switching on/off S7 type Bool PLC e.g. 55.1 for DB4DBX55.1 could be same as get_On.

set_On_Set.title: Separate Bits mode: set_On_Set **(control support)**
set_On_Set.description: Separate Bits mode: offset and bit set to 1 when switching off. PLC has to set to 0 S7 type Bool e.g. 55.2

set_On_Reset.title: Separate Bits mode: offset set_On_Reset
set_On_Reset.description:
Separate Bits mode: offset and bit set to 1 when switching off. PLC has to set to 0 S7 type Bool e.g. 55.3
NOTE: When defining this the behaviour of set_On changes to Seperate Bit mode.

set_Active.title: Single Bit mode: offset set_Active (bool)
set_Active.description:
Single Bit mode: offset and bit to set to 1/0 to PLC when switching on/off S7 type Bool PLC e.g. 55.1 for DB4DBX55.1 could be same as get_Active
Separate Bits mode: offset and bit set to 1 when switching off. PLC has to set to 0 S7 type Bool e.g. 55.2

set_Active_Set.title: Separate Bits mode: offset set_Active_Set
set_Active_Set.description: Separate Bits mode: offset and bit set to 1 when switching off. PLC has to set to 0 S7 type Bool e.g. 55.2

set_Active_Reset.title: Separate Bits mode: offset set_Active_Reset
set_Active_Reset.description:
Separate Bits mode: offset and bit set to 1 when switching off. PLC has to set to 0 S7 type Bool e.g. 55.3
NOTE: When defining this the behaviour of set_Active changes to Seperate Bit mode.

get_Brightness.title: offset get_Brightness (byte)
get_Brightness.description: get brightness value S7 type Byte e.g. 56 for DB4DBB56

set_Brightness.title: offset set_Brightness (byte)
set_Brightness.description: set brightness value S7 type Byte e.g. 57 for DB4DBB57

get_CurrentTemperature.title: offset get_CurrentTemperature **(push support)**
get_CurrentTemperature.description: offset to get current temperature S7 type Real e.g. 55 for DB4DBD55

get_CurrentRelativeHumidity.title: offset get_CurrentRelativeHumidity **(push support)**
get_CurrentRelativeHumidity.description: offset to get current humidity S7 type Real e.g. 55 for DB4DBD55

get_TargetTemperature.title: offset get_TargetTemperature **(push support)**
get_TargetTemperature.description: offset to get target temperature S7 type `Real` e.g. `4` for `DB4DBD4`

set_TargetTemperature.title: offset get_TargetTemperature **(control support)*
set_TargetTemperature.description: offset to set current temperature S7 type `Real` e.g. `4` for `DB4DBD4` (can have same value as get_TargetTemperature)

get_TargetRelativeHumidity.title: offset get_TargetRelativeHumidity **(push support)**
get_TargetRelativeHumidity.description: offset to get target temperature S7 type `Real` e.g. `4` for `DB4DBD4`

set_TargetRelativeHumidity.title: offset get_TargetTemperature **(control support)**
set_TargetRelativeHumidity.description: offset to set current temperature S7 type `Real` e.g. `4` for `DB4DBD4` (can have same value as get_TargetTemperature)

get_CurrentHeatingCoolingState.title: offset get_CurrentHeatingCoolingState **(push support)**
get_CurrentHeatingCoolingState.description:
offset to get current heating/cooling state S7 type `Byte` e.g. `8` for `DB4DBB8`. When not defined fixed `1`: heating is used.
- `0`: inactive (shown as green in home app)
- `1`: heating (shown as orange in home app)
- `2`: cooling (shown as blue in home app)

get_TargetHeatingCoolingState.title: offset get_TargetHeatingCoolingState **(push support)**
get_TargetHeatingCoolingState.description:
offset to get target heating/cooling state. S7 type `Byte` e.g. `9` for `DB4DBB9`. When not defined fixed `3`: automatic is used.
- `0`: off
- `1`: heat
- `2`: cool
- `3`: automatic

set_TargetHeatingCoolingState.title: offset set_TargetHeatingCoolingState **(control support)**
set_TargetHeatingCoolingState.description:
offset to set target heating/cooling state. Can be identical with `get_TargetHeatingCoolingState`. Has to be defined when `get_TargetHeatingCoolingState` is defined. When not defined writes changes are ignored. S7 type `Byte` e.g. `9` for `DB4DBB9`.
- `0`: off
- `1`: heat
- `2`: cool
- `3`: automatic

get_CurrentHumidifierDehumidifierState.title: offset get_CurrentHumidifierDehumidifierState **(optional)** **(push support)**
get_CurrentHumidifierDehumidifierState.description:
offset to get current state. Default value `1:idle`. S7 type `Byte` e.g. `55` for `DB4DBD55`
- `0`: inactive
- `1`: idle
- `2`: humidifying
- `3`: dehumidifying

mapGetCurrentHumidifierDehumidifierState.title: mapGetCurrentHumidifierDehumidifierState **(optional)**
mapGetCurrentHumidifierDehumidifierState.description: define mapping array for `get_CurrentHumidifierDehumidifierState`. The PLC value is used as index into the table. e.g. `[1, 3]` which maps the PLC value `0->1 1->3` when the PLC supports only two states with `0:idle` and `1:dehumidifying`.

default_TargetHumidifierDehumidifierStat.title: default TargetHumidifierDehumidifierState **(optional)**
default_TargetHumidifierDehumidifierStat.description:
defines alternative value thats returned then `get_TargetHumidifierDehumidifierState` is not defined. Default value `0:auto`
- `0`: auto (humidifier or dehumidifier)
- `1`: humidifier
- `2`: dehumidifier

get_TargetHumidifierDehumidifierState.title: offset get_TargetHumidifierDehumidifierState **(optional)** **(push support)**
get_TargetHumidifierDehumidifierState.description:
offset to get current target state S7 type `Byte` e.g. `55` for `DB4DBD55`
- `0`: auto (humidifier or dehumidifier)
- `1`: humidifier
- `2`: dehumidifier

set_TargetHumidifierDehumidifierState.title: offset set_TargetHeatingCoolingState **(optional)** **(control support)**
set_TargetHumidifierDehumidifierState.description:
*offset to set current target state. Needs to be defined when `get_TargetHumidifierDehumidifierState` is set S7 type `Byte` e.g. `55` for `DB4DBD55`
- `0`: auto (humidifier or dehumidifier)
- `1`: humidifier
- `2`: dehumidifier

mapGetTargetHumidifierDehumidifierState.title: mapGetTargetHumidifierDehumidifierState
mapGetTargetHumidifierDehumidifierState.description: **(optional)** define mapping array for `get_TargetHumidifierDehumidifierState`. The PLC value is used as index into the table. e.g. `[2,1]` which maps the PLC value `0->1 1->2` when the PLC supports only one states with `0:dehumidifier 1:humidifier.

mapSetTargetHumidifierDehumidifierState.title: mapSetTargetHumidifierDehumidifierState **(optional)**
mapSetTargetHumidifierDehumidifierState.description: define mapping array for `set_TargetHumidifierDehumidifierState`. The home app value is used as index into the table. e.g. `[2, 2, 2] writes always the value 2 to the plc regardless whats set in the home app

get_RotationSpeedByte.title: offset get_RotationSpeedByte **(optional)** **(push support)**
get_RotationSpeedByte.description: offset to get rotation speed state S7 type `Byte` e.g. `8` for `DB4DBB8`.

set_RotationSpeedByte.title: offset set_RotationSpeedByte **(optional but required when `set_RotationSpeedByte` is defined)** **(push support)**
set_RotationSpeedByte.description: offset to get set speed state. S7 type `Byte` e.g. `9` for `DB4DBB9`

get_RotationSpeed.title: offset get_RotationSpeedByte **(optional)** **(push support)**
get_RotationSpeed.description: offset to get rotation speed state S7 type `Real` e.g. `8` for `DB4DBB8`.

set_RotationSpeed.title: offset set_RotationSpeedByte **(optional but required when `get_RotationSpeed` is defined)** **(push support)**
set_RotationSpeed.description: offset to get set speed state. S7 type `Real` e.g. `9` for `DB4DBB9`

get_SwingMode.title: offset get_SwingMode **(optional)** **(push support)**
get_SwingMode.description:
offset to get swing mode. S7 type `byte` e.g. `8` for `DB4DBB8`.
- `0`: swing disabled
- `1`: swing enabled

set_SwingMode.title: offset set_SwingMode **(optional but required when `get_SwingMode` is defined)** **(push support)**
set_SwingMode.description:
offset to set swing mode. S7 type `byte` e.g. `9` for `DB4DBB9`.
- `0`: swing disabled
- `1`: swing enabled

get_WaterLevel.title: offset get_WaterLevel **(optional)** **(push support)**
get_WaterLevel.description: offset to get water level. S7 type `Real` e.g. `8` for `DB4DBD8`.

get_CurrentPosition.title: offset get_CurrentPosition **(push support)**
get_CurrentPosition.description:
offset to get current position `0:closed 100:open` S7 type `Byte` e.g. `0` for `DB4DBB0`
- `0`: closed
- `in between`: partly open
- `100`: open

invertPosition.title: invertPosition **(optional)**
invertPosition.description: set to `true` to inverts the values of current and target position from `0:closed 100:open` to `100:closed 0:open`

forceCurrentPosition.title: forceCurrentPosition **(optional)**
forceCurrentPosition.description: when set to `true` the position set by `set_TargetPosition` is directly used as current position. By this it seems in tha home app as the target position was directly reached. This is recommended when not using `adaptivePolling` or pushing the value from the plc.

mapGetCurrentPosition.title: mapGetCurrentPosition **(optional)**
mapGetCurrentPosition.description: define mapping array for get position. The PLC value is used as index into the table. e.g. `[0, 25, 100]` which maps the PLC value `0->0 1->25 2->100` this this is useful e.g. for window open state.

get_TargetPosition.title: offset get_TargetPosition **(optional)** **(push support)**
get_TargetPosition.description:
offset to get target position S7 type `Byte` e.g. `1` for `DB4DBB1` (can have same value as set_TargetPosition)
- `0`: closed
- `in between`: partly open
- `100`: open

set_TargetPosition.title: offset get_TargetPosition **(optional)** **(control support)**
set_TargetPosition.description:
offset to set current position `0:closed 100:open` S7 type `Byte` e.g. `2` for `DB4DBB2` (can have same value as get_TargetPosition)
- `0`: closed
- `in between`: partly open
- `100`: open

get_PositionState.title: offset get_PositionState **(optional)** **(push support)**
get_PositionState.description:
offset to current movement state if not defined fixed `2`is returned S7 type `Byte` e.g. `3` for `DB4DBB3`
- `0`: down
- `1`: up
- `2`: stop

set_HoldPosition.title: offset set_HoldPosition **(optional)** **(control support)**
set_HoldPosition.description: offset and bit set to 1 to stop movement. (Seems not to be used by HomeApp) when not defined writes will be ignoredS7 type `Bool` **PLC has to set to 0** e.g. `55.1` for `DB4DBX55.1`

get_OccupancyDetected.title: get_OccupancyDetected **(push support)**
get_OccupancyDetected.description:
offset and bit get the current status S7 type `Bool` e.g. `55.0` for `DB4DBX55.0`
- `false`: no occupancy
- `true`: occupancy detected

invertOccupancy.title: invertOccupancy
invertOccupancy.description:
when enabled it inverts the logic of get_OccupancyDetected to
`false:motion detected` and `true:no motion`.

get_MotionDetected.title: get_MotionDetected **(push support)**
get_MotionDetected.description:
offset and bit get the current status S7 type `Bool` e.g. `55.0` for `DB4DBX55.0`
- `false`: no occupancy
- `true`: occupancy detected

invertMotionDetected.title: invertMotionDetected
invertMotionDetected.description:
when enabled it inverts the logic of get_MotionDetected to
`false:closed` and `true:no motion`.

get_ContactSensorState.title: get_ContactSensorState **(push support)**
get_ContactSensorState.description:
offset and bit get the current status S7 type `Bool` e.g. `55.0` for `DB4DBX55.0`
- `false`: closed
- `true`: open

invertContactSensorState.title: invertContactSensorState
invertContactSensorState.description:
when enabled it inverts the logic of get_ContactSensorState to
`false:open` and `true:closed.

get_LeakDetected.title: get_LeakDetected **(push support)**
get_LeakDetected.description:
offset and bit get the current status S7 type `Bool` e.g. `55.0` for `DB4DBX55.0`
- `false`: no leak detected
- `true`: leak detected

invertLeakDetected.title: invertLeakDetected
invertLeakDetected.description:
when enabled it inverts the logic of get_ContactSensorState to
`false:leak detected` and `true:no leak detected.

get_SetDuration.title: get_SetDuration **(push support)**
get_SetDuration.description: offset to get duration 0..3600 sec S7 type `Time` e.g. `10` for `DB4DBD10`

set_SetDuration.title: set_SetDuration **(control support)**
set_SetDuration.description: offset to set duration 0..3600 sec S7 type `Time` e.g. `14` for `DB4DBD10`

get_RemainingDuration.title: get_RemainingDuration **(push support)**
get_RemainingDuration.description: offset to get remaining duration 0..3600 sec S7 type `Time` e.g. `18` for `DB4DBD10`
